Trial_Design.evidence: Patients were randomized to three interventions

Intervention.evidence: health educator(s) delivered an intervention to (a) the patient and his/her guests in the patient’s home (House Calls, HC n=54), (b) clusters of patients and their guests in the transplant center (Group-Based, GB n=49), (c) the individual patient alone in the transplant center (Individual Counseling, IC n=49)

Objective.evidence: We evaluated the effectiveness of educational interventions in removing barriers to LDKT for blacks.

Number_Randomised.evidence: HC n=54, GB n=49, IC n=49

Result_Outcome.evidence: 15% (8), 8% (4), and 6% (3) of HC, GB, and IC patients, respectively, received LDKT (p=0.30)
